module.name: themeinstallator
module.description: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Export or Install a theme and its modules on your shop.

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Our payments platform comes with an exclusive reduced fee offer of 0.9% on Debit Card/Prepaid Card/Credit Card (VISA, Mastercard, Maestro) transactions, and 0.5% fees on Rapid Transfer transactions. *Fees apply to new merchants only within restricted industry sectors. Terms and conditions apply - https://www.skrill.com/en/footer/terms-conditions/fees-reduction-promotion/Free and quick set upActivate credit cards and 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationTake advantage of the Skrill multicurrency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: fedexcarrier
module.description: Offer your customers different delivery methods with Fedex!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer your customers different delivery methods with Fedex!

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Because your business is precious, it needs to be protected, it will help you make it grow peacefully and keep an eye on risky orders.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Protect your store: stay up-to-date on security to prevent your activity from bad intentions.Offer scoring possibilities: get a scoring for each order to evaluate how risky it can be.

module.name: uspscarrier
module.description: Calculates shipping rates for United States Postal Service for Domestic shipping within the USA
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Calculates shipping rates for United States Postal Service for Domestic shipping within the USA.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method.
module.additional_description: Use this native module to: - Keep your store up-to-date: benefit from the latest features and improvements available. - Protect your store: stay up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: gamification
module.description: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Check your completion rate and unblock all badges to become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Keep up with your store: benefit from PrestaShop’s wide range of features and learn to use them all.Explore all possibilities: with the click of a button, be able to see sales-enhancing features you might be missing out on.

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date.
module.additional_description: Optimize natural search (SEO) on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo...) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal is the fast, easy, secure way to accept payments online in 24 currencies from 193 countries around the globe. Your customers don't need a PayPal account to pay, and you get paid quickly.﻿

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sendinblue: Your all-in-one marketing module for managing and improving your customer relationships through more effective, multi-channel marketing communication to sell more!
module.additional_description: Synchronize your PrestaShop subscribers with Sendinblue, create beautifully designed emails, and automatically follow up with customers who abandon their cart with a personalized message -- all from a single platform. With the Sendinblue module, you can:Keep better track of your customer relationships by automatically synchronizing your contacts with Sendinblue.Be there for your customers while they browse your website by automatically installing live chat.Increase your sales with Sendinblue's abandoned cart functionality -- set it up in minutes!Wow your subscribers and keep them coming back with beautiful newsletters and marketing emails.Sell more with retargeting to bring visitors back to your store in order to complete their purchase.Make sure your most important emails (subscription & order confirmations, password resets, etc.) make it to the inbox with a platform designed for deliverability.Get support when you need it from a team who cares! Available by phone or email. See the tutorial: https://help.sendinblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001123645-PrestaShop-1-7-Set-up-the-plugin

module.name: dateofdelivery
module.description: 72% of customers are satisfied when they can see expected delivery dates of their purchases; let’s satisfy yours up to 100%!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 72% of customers are satisfied when they can see expected delivery dates of their purchases; let’s satisfy yours up to 100%!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Ensure the transparency of your business: give reassurance by keeping your customers informed of your delivery dates.Increase your conversion rate: you will make your customers confident about purchasing on your online shop.

module.name: favoriteproducts
module.description: Display a page featuring the customer's favorite products
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display a page featuring the customer's favorite products.

module.name: crossselling
module.description: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page.

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution that helps businesses sell more by enabling their customers to pay how they want to pay
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution that helps businesses sell more by enabling their customers to pay how they want to pay.It is a uniquely versatile, highly secure and incredibly simple cloud-based payments platform.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from: ·         Omni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce store·         Extensive versatile features including einvoicing, virtual terminal and social commerce·         Accepting major card brands·         Highest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: cronjobs
module.description: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make the development of your activity your main goal, don’t lose time working on minor tasks: automate it!
module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Save time: turn simple jobs into programmed tasks you won’t have to care about too much.Schedule your needs: and make it automatically done, easy-peasy!Handle all these tasks: have it all listed at the same place to better manage each job and create new ones if needed.

module.name: bluesnap
module.description: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BlueSnap is an all-in-one payment solution, providing both a merchant account and payment gateway designed to accelerate commerce for merchants selling globally.   By connecting your PrestaShop store with BlueSnap, you can accept payments securely from shoppers anywhere in the world in their local currency. BlueSnap provides analytics and reporting to make it easy to identify opportunities for higher conversions. In addition, PrestaShop merchants process credit and debit card transactions with a secure checkout form, which is displayed directly on your checkout page so shoppers never leave your store.
module.additional_description: All-in one payment solution:Combined merchant account and payment gateway for fast & easy on-boardingAbility to board merchants globallyNo long-term contracts or setup fees, and the most competitive transaction fees in the industryHigher payment conversionsMinimized PCI Scope

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: At 1&1 you’ll find the perfect hosting package for your needs. And thanks to convenient 1-click installation, setting up PrestaShop is especially easy The default offer is for the USA.  Please click here to benefit from the UK special offer and here if you are based in Canada
module.additional_description: Further advantages you can benefit from with 1&1 New Hosting:Choose from 40 Click & Build Apps including PrestaShop1&1 Expert App Support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week – with advice and practical help specific to the application you’re usingMaximum availability thanks to the geo-redundant hosting of your website in two geographically separate data centres1&1 SiteLock included, keeping your website virus-freeGuaranteed performance from 2 GB RAM (with the 1&1 Unlimited Plus package) Domain included free with select packages (.co.uk, .com, .net, .org, .me.uk or .org.uk)Unlimited power: Unlimited webspace, traffic, and MySQL databases

module.name: getresponse_old
module.description: Connect your store with GetResponse and use all-in-one-online marketing tools to convert contacts to customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your store with GetResponse and use all-in-one-online marketing tools to convert contacts to customers. With a full suite of powerful ecommerce features, it’s easy to market your online shop and sell more to your customers.
module.additional_description: GetResponse for PrestaShop is a free integration that allows you to populate your product inventory in GetResponse, add customers and order details to your GetResponse list, see what your customers love to buy, and then take action. Send automated, personalized offers to convert more customers and sell more products. Syncing your PrestaShop products and purchase data with your GetResponse account means you can send timely, personalized offers, win back abandoned carts, upsell with automated product recommendations, build high-converting sales funnels that promote your products, and more.  More than 350,000 customers in 183 countries trust GetResponse, the easiest all-in-one online marketing platform, to help grow their business. From small businesses to bigger enterprises, GetResponse customers can harness the power of email marketing, sales and marketing funnels, marketing automation, webinars, CRM, and advanced ecommerce tools to optimize and automate critical points of the customer journey – all from one account.

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site. Amazon Pay can help you build, maintain loyal customers and as a result increase your sales.
module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.name: cartsguru
module.description: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Multichannel Marketing Automation Platform for e-merchants
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Carts Guru is the all-in-one Multichannel Marketing Automation Platform for e-merchants. With our new platform, you can unlock the full potential of your e-commerce business and significantly increase your conversion rate.
module.additional_description: Developed in-house, the technology combines all the tools you need to gather all your data in one place, improve the user journey and grow your business. Multichannel Campaigns to reach your entire audienceAutomated Marketing to increase your conversion rate without effortRelevant Customer Journey to offer your clients what they expect from your brand Try it now for free with your Freemium plan or the 14 day-free-trial.

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: upela
module.displayName: Upela - Parcel shipping at the best rate
module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.name: cleverppc
module.displayName: Ads on Google (Google Shopping + Dynamic Remarketing)
module.description: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: We create and optimize your Google Ads campaigns!Boost your SEM strategy with our free module, your products will be announced on the Google network.If your account is suitable, we will apply a $75 coupon for your first campaigns!
module.additional_description: What do we do for you:Google Shopping campaigns: We create, manage and optimize your Google Shopping campaigns.Search campaigns: Be seen by customers as they search on Google.Display campaigns: Display Banners & Text Ads to reach people interested in your products.Remarketing and Dynamic Remarketing campaigns: Follow your own visitors through the internet offering your products once they leave your site. Benefits for your store:Maximize your marketing budget: Clever Google Ads app adjust bids with algorithms to ensure the best results.Attract the right customers to your store: We take the customers to your store in the very moment they are looking for your products on Google.Increase your ROI: Start getting potential customers at the lowest CPC and maximize your ROI!Get qualified traffic: Stop wasting money on useless clicks and start getting relevant traffic.Campaigns automatization: Our algorithm will learn the best way to help optimizing your campaigns through our technology of machine learning.

module.name: viabill
module.description: ViaBill provides a seamless financing solution for thousands of merchants and customers across the world
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ViaBill provides a seamless financing solution for thousands of merchants and customers across the world. We’re increasing average order sizes, providing low transaction costs and putting the customer in focus so they can get what they want, when they want it; all of which benefits, you, the merchant.
module.additional_description: ViaBill enables you to provide seamless financing to your customers. Allow your customers to buy now and pay in 4 equal monthly payments without any interest or fees. Convert the “maybe laters” into buyers, while increasing your average-order-value by 32.7%. We’ll handle both fraud and credit risk, while you’ll get paid right away.

badge.label: Average cart: Partner of the year

module.name: acutrackauthtoken
module.description: Acutrack is a technology-driven eCommerce fulfillment company with a specialization in publishing any product needed for your business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Acutrack is a technology-driven eCommerce fulfillment company with a specialization in publishing any product needed for your business. Our ability to produce books and media packages has created a true value to our customers for over 25+ years.
module.additional_description: Acutrack is a technology driven, experienced business partner. With logistics center on both coasts of the USA, we serve as a one-stop logistic center for your business needs! Reliable PartnerWhen it comes to your inventory and orders, you want a partner who has a strong track record and is transparent in its dealings. Acutrack is an experienced fulfillment house and someone you can rely upon. Check out Acutrack reviews on Trustpilot. Coast to Coast CoverageAcutrack has a presence on both coasts and thus, can cover all areas of the country in a two-day shipping window. With fulfillment warehouses on each coast, you can save money by cutting down on high zone, high-cost shipments. Fulfillment driven by TechnologyAcutrack seamlessly integrates with Prestashop or bring full suite of API technology to integrate with any  platform. When your customers click “Buy It Now,” everything must run smoothly and error-free from start to finish. Publishing SolutionAcutrack is the market leader in Books, DVDs, USB thumb drive fulfillment. These services provide a powerful solution for to offer physical products in conjunction with digital distribution. Ultimately, physical products offered with digital distribution helps you increase revenue, grow your brand and customer satisfaction

module.name: adscale
module.displayName: AdScale - AI Advertising on Google & Facebook
module.description: AdScale weaves the power of AI technology into your advertising by automatically creating and optimizing ads across Google, Facebook & Instagram, with an average ROI of 10X and succ
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: AdScale weaves the power of AI technology into your advertising by automatically creating and optimizing ads across Google, Facebook & Instagram, with an average ROI of 10X and success-based pricing
module.additional_description: AdScale helps your business grow faster with the most advanced advertising technology.AdScale manages your budget smartly without spending money on guesswork.AdScale advertises your store automatically, saving the media agency costs.Adcale’s AI technology targets the right customer with the right product at the right time. Main Features : Automated Ads Creation - Utilize AdScale’s AI to fully automate ads creation across Google Search, Google Shopping, Facebook & Instagram. 24/7 Performance Optimization - AdScale's Machine Learning Algorithm will constantly optimize your advertising performance by adjusting your bids, budgets, and audience targeting. Cross-Channel Analytics - Manage all of Google & Facebook advertising performance using a single Easy-To-Use Dashboard. How AdScale worksOnce installed, AdScale connects to your store and analyze your products and historical data.Then, it creates for your store dedicated ads on Google & Facebook, including all the relevant assets: Google: Tracking pixel Merchant Center Product feed Targeted keywords Google Search ads Google Shopping ads Facebook:  Tailor-made audiences Product catalog Facebook pixel Facebook Ads Instagram Ads  Once the ads are live and running, AdScale AI is working 24/7 to optimize your ad performance and maximize your revenue. “Adscale streamlined our marketing & delivered 1,312% ROI during the last quarter” - Idan from Speedo “Our sales have increased by more than 200% last year while reducing advertising budget by 60%” - Keren from Jansport “AdScale took my advertising budget and helped me earn returns 10x higher than my investment” - Elisa from Annabelle Boutique

module.name: livechatconnect
module.description: LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module adds a chat widget to your store with ease
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module adds a chat widget to your store with ease. With LiveChat, you’ll be able to have conversations with on-site visitors, so you can offer them the help they need and help convert them into sales.
module.additional_description: LiveChat lets you chat with customers on the website, providing immediate assistance and increasing sales and customer satisfaction. This means you’ll be able to reach out to all of those customers that are looking for information on your website who would otherwise never try to contact you.  Thanks to LiveChat’s PrestaShop live chat module, you can trace your customers’ browsing habits and get to know them better. Also, you can see which page they are browsing and offer help in choosing the right product.  In addition to this,LiveChat provides a great customer engagement feature: chat invitations. It allows you to send time-based invitations for undecided shoppers. You can also nurture customers who reached a certain cart value to motivate them to make a purchase.

module.name: fulfillmentbridge
module.description: Your one-stop solution for PrestaShop global logistics. Efficient, fast and affordable global fulfillment solutions with added love for PrestaShop e-commerce
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your one-stop solution for PrestaShop global logistics. Efficient, fast and affordable global fulfillment solutions with added love for PrestaShop e-commerce.  Picking, packing, shipping, tracking, returns, warehousing, import, export and more….
module.additional_description: What You Can Do With the Fulfillment Bridge + PrestaShop Addon:Easily manage inventory and shipping on multiple sales channels.Cut delivery times when shipping to customers via a global multi-warehouse network.Eliminate complexity with a truly end-to-end order management system.Always be in the know with real-time inventory management synching across multiple warehouses and multiple sales channels.Save money and access discounted shipping rates normally reserved for uber-volume sellers.Never have to track down a package for a customer again, with the help of a dedicated brand manager all your current logistics hassles can become a distant memory.Optimized return management, reverse logistics can be easier than you think when you are partnered with a fulfillment provider with the tech and global warehousing resources you get with Fulfillment Bridge.
